tool_description: Identifies matching brackets, braces, and parentheses in source code and detects mismatched pairs.

source_code.description: The source code to analyze for bracket matching

bracket_types.description: Types of brackets to match: parentheses, square, curly, angle

error_messages: Invalid bracket_types: Use parentheses, square, curly, or angle.
Empty source code: Provide non-empty source code for analysis.
Parsing error: Unable to analyze bracket structure due to syntax errors.
usage: Provide source_code and optionally specify which bracket_types to analyze. Enable highlight_mismatches to identify problematic brackets.

matched_pairs.description: List of successfully matched bracket pairs with positions

mismatched_brackets.description: List of unmatched brackets with positions

bracket_balance.description: Whether all brackets are properly balanced
